markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Defensive Needles](/Feats.aspx?ID=3431) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 77</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cactus Leshy](/Heritages.aspx?ID=99) heritage or [Pine Leshy](/Heritages.aspx?ID=198) heritage

**Access**
Pine leshies have access to this feat

</column>

---

Your body is covered in sharp needles or spines which you can use to defend yourself. Each time you become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by a creature or an adjacent creature hits you with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack, you twist and thrash your body around, dealing 2 piercing damage to that creature. This damage increases to 3 at 9th level, 4 at 13th level, and 5 at 17th level.
